head.name: 正體中文

info.src: You need to restart to make the language settings take effect!

head.info: 需要重新啓動讓語言設定生效！

item.src: Cannot keep up with this sample rate.
Clear settings when the software starts next time

vis.item: 軟體下次啟動時清除設定

item.src: Even if the trigger is not met
It's the latest version, no updates required.

vis.item: 目前已是最新版本，無須更新.

item.src: Keep exactly the same position as before (if possible)

vis.item: 保持與之前相同的位置(可能的話)

item.src: Keep settings when the software starts next time

vis.item: 軟體下次啟動時保持本次設定
青島金思特電子有限公司

item.src: Only use the computer's memory to store the sampled data, the data is uploaded in real time.

vis.item: 僅使用電腦記憶體儲存取樣資料，資料需實時上傳至電腦。

item.src: Only when the trigger is met
Place this setting on the toolbar.

vis.item: 將此設定放到工具列上.

item.src: Please click the link below to download.
Please enter an integer in the range
Please select at least one channel.
Please try to reduce the sample rate.
Quitting can lead to unpredictable errors.

vis.item: 退出可能導致不可預知的錯誤.
取樣深度(每次採集的樣本數)
取樣率(每秒鐘的取樣次數)

item.src: Show time zero, with previous zoom level

vis.item: 以上一次縮放等級，顯示零時基準

item.src: Sorry, timing marker pairs has reached the maximum number.

vis.item: 抱歉，時基標尺已達到最大數量.

item.src: Sorry, there is no measurable data.

vis.item: 抱歉，沒有資料以供測量.

item.src: Sorry, there is no data that can be exported.

vis.item: 抱歉，沒有資料以供匯出.

item.src: Sorry, there is no data that can be saved.

vis.item: 抱歉，沒有資料以供儲存.

item.src: The effective range of threshold voltage is
The effective range of PWM:[0.1Hz,20MHz], duty cycle:[0,1].

vis.item: PWM頻率有效範圍: [0.1Hz, 20MHz], 空佔比範圍: [0,1].

item.src: This mode can provide higher sample rate.

vis.item: 此模式可提供更高的取樣率。

item.src: This mode can provide larger sample depth.

vis.item: 此模式可提供更高的取樣深度。

item.src: Use the device's memory as the sample buffer, the data is uploaded to computer after sampled.

vis.item: 使用裝置內部記憶體作為取樣緩衝區，資料在取樣完成後上傳至電腦。

item.src: When a channel is checked, pulses less than the set width will be filtered out.

vis.item: 勾選某一通道後，小於設定寬度的脈衝將被濾除。

item.src: You may need to install a PDF reader to open the user guide.

vis.item: 您可能需要安裝PDF閱讀器以打開用戶手冊.

item.src: The analyzer will only operate at high speed overdrive mode.

analyzers.item: 分析器只在高速模式下運作。

item.src: Level of the communication to decode
Please select an input for the SDA channel.
Specify the bit rate in bits per second.
Use this option when recording CAN High directly

analyzers.item: 直接採集CAN High時使用此選項

item.src: Please select a channel for the CAN interface

analyzers.item: 請為CAN介面選擇一組通道

item.src: Accept 4us MAB as per USITT DMX-512 (1986)
Specify how you would like the I2C address to be displayed.
SDA and SCL can't be assigned to the same input.

analyzers.item: SDA和SCL不能指定到同一組輸入。

item.src: Clock, aka I2S SCK - Continuous Serial Clock, aka Bit Clock

analyzers.item: 時脈，又名I2S SCK - 連續序列時脈，又名位元時脈

item.src: Frame Delimiter / aka I2S WS - Word Select, aka Sampling Clock

analyzers.item: 訊框定界符/又名I2S WS - 字選擇，又名取樣時脈

item.src: Data, aka I2S SD - Serial Data

analyzers.item: 資料，又名I2S SD - 序列資料

item.src: Specify if data comes in MSB first, or LSB first.

analyzers.item: 指定資料最高有效位(MSB)在前或是最低有效位(LSB)在前。

item.src: Specify if data is valid (should be read) on the rising, or falling clock edge.

analyzers.item: 指定資料是在時脈上升沿或是下降沿有效(被讀取)

item.src: DATA is valid (should be read) on the CLOCK falling edge

analyzers.item: 資料在時脈下降沿有效(被讀取)

item.src: DATA is valid (should be read) on the CLOCK rising edge

analyzers.item: 資料在時脈上升沿有效(被讀取)

item.src: Specify the number of audio bits/word. Any additional bits will be ignored

analyzers.item: 指定聲音(bits/word)數量。任何多餘的位元將被忽略

item.src: Specify the type of frame signal used.

analyzers.item: 指定使用的訊框信號類型。

item.src: FRAME signal transitions (changes state) twice each word.
FRAME signal transitions (changes state) once each word. (I2S, PCM standard)
FRAME signal transitions(changes state) twice every four (4) words.
Specify whether data bits are left or right aligned wrt FRAME edges. Only needed if more bits are sent than needed each frame, and additional bits are ignored.
DATA bits are left-aligned with respect to FRAME edges
DATA bits are right-aligned with respect to FRAME edges
Specify the bit alignment type to use.

analyzers.item: 指定使用的位元對齊類型。

item.src: Bits are right-shifted by one with respect to FRAME edges (I2S typical)
Bits are not shifted with respect to FRAME edges (PCM typical)
Select whether samples are unsigned or signed values (only shows up if the display type is decimal)

analyzers.item: 取樣是帶符號數 (2's 補數)

item.src: Interpret samples as signed integers -- only when display type is set to decimal

analyzers.item: 當顯示類型設定成十進制時，將取樣作為帶號數解讀

item.src: Select whether WS high is channel 1 or channel 2
Word select high is channel 2 (right) (I2S typical)
Please select a channel for I2S/PCM CLOCK signal

analyzers.item: 請為I2S/PCM CLOCK信號選擇一組通道

item.src: Please select a channel for I2S/PCM FRAME signal

analyzers.item: 請為I2S/PCM FRAME信號選擇一組通道

item.src: Please select a channel for I2S/PCM DATA signal

analyzers.item: 請為I2S/PCM DATA信號選擇一組通道

item.src: Please select different channels for the I2S/PCM signals

analyzers.item: 請為I2S/PCM信號選擇不同的通道
指令集暫存器移位位元順序
資料暫存器移位位元順序

item.src: Data register shift MOST significant bit first
Data register shift LEAST significant bit first
Used to count bits sent during Shift state

analyzers.item: 移位狀態期間記錄發送位元數

item.src: Please select inputs for TMS and TCK channels.
Please select different channels for each input.

analyzers.item: 請為每個輸入選擇不同的通道。

item.src: Specify the LIN protocol version 1 or 2.
Specify the bit rate in bits per second.

analyzers.item: 指定曼徹斯特編碼模式

item.src: Specify the bit rate in bits per second.
Specify the Manchester edge polarity (Normal Manchester mode only)

analyzers.item: 指定曼徹斯特編碼資料緣極性（限一般指定曼徹斯特編碼模式）

item.src: Select the number of bits per frame
Select if the most significant bit or least significant bit is transmitted first

analyzers.item: 選擇最高有效位(MSB)或最低有效位(LSB)先送

item.src: Specify the number of preamble bits to ignore.

analyzers.item: 指定要忽略的前置位元數量。

item.src: Specify the Manchester Tolerance as a percentage of period

analyzers.item: 以周期的百分比指定曼徹斯特編碼公差

item.src: Specify which mode of Modbus this is
Specify the bit rate in bits per second.
Specify if the serial signal is inverted

analyzers.item: 指定序列信號是否反相

item.src: Data is valid on E/Clock rising edge
Data is valid on E/Clock falling edge
Please select at least one channel to use in the parallel bus

analyzers.item: 請為並列匯流排選擇至少一組通道

item.src: Clock and Data must be unique channels!

analyzers.item: Clock和Data的通道必須各自獨立！

item.src: Determines if sample on rising or falling edge

analyzers.item: 指定在時脈上升沿或下降沿取樣(讀取資料)

item.src: Read Samples on Falling clock edge

analyzers.item: 在時脈下降沿讀取/取樣

item.src: Read Samples on Rising clock edge

analyzers.item: 在時脈上升沿讀取/取樣

item.src: Please specify the channels for clock and command
true - calculate PEC, false - no PEC on packets

analyzers.item: 勾選 - 計算封包上的PEC，無勾選 - 不計算封包上的PEC

item.src: Please select an input for the SMBDAT.

analyzers.item: 請為SMBDAT通道選擇一組輸入。

item.src: Please select an input for the SMBCLK.

analyzers.item: 請為SMBCLK通道選擇一組輸入。

item.src: Please select different inputs for the channels.

analyzers.item: 請為通道選擇不同的輸入。
匯流排空閑時，時脈為低電平 (CPOL = 0)
匯流排空閑時，時脈為高電平 (CPOL = 1)

item.src: Data is Valid on Clock Leading Edge (CPHA = 0)

analyzers.item: 資料在時脈前緣有效(被讀取) (CPHA = 0)

item.src: Data is Valid on Clock Trailing Edge (CPHA = 1)

analyzers.item: 資料在時脈後緣有效(被讀取) (CPHA = 1)

item.src: Please select different channels for each input.

analyzers.item: 請為每個通道選擇一組輸入。

item.src: Please select at least one input for either MISO or MOSI.

analyzers.item: 請在 MISO 和 MOSI 中選擇至少一組通道。

item.src: Please select an input for SWDIO channel.

analyzers.item: 請為SWDIO通道選擇一組輸入。

item.src: Please select an input for SWCLK channel.

analyzers.item: 請為SWCLK通道選擇一組輸入。

item.src: Please select different inputs for the channels.

analyzers.item: 請為通道選擇不同的輸入。

item.src: Specify the bit rate in bits per second.
Automatically find the minimum pulse width and calculate the baud rate according to this pulse width.

analyzers.item: 自動尋找最低頻寬，據此計算鮑率。

item.src: Specify if the serial signal is inverted
Select the number of bits per frame
Specify the number of stop bits.
Specify None, Even, or Odd Parity.
Select if the most significant bit or least significant bit is transmitted first

analyzers.item: 選擇最高有效位(MSB)或最低有效位(LSB)先送

item.src: Specify if this is normal, or MP serial (aka multi-drop, MP, multi-processor, 9-bit serial)

analyzers.item: 指定是否為多點通信模式

item.src: MP Mode: Address indicated by MSB=0
MDB Mode: Address indicated by MSB=1
Sorry, but we don't support using parity at the same time as MP mode.

analyzers.item: 抱歉，不支援MP模式下使用同位檢查。

item.src: Please select an input for the D+ channel.

analyzers.item: 請為D+通道選擇一組輸入。

item.src: Please select an input for the D- channel.

analyzers.item: 請為D-通道選擇一組輸入。

item.src: Please select different inputs for the D- and D+ channels.

analyzers.item: 請為D-和D+通道選擇不同的輸入。
